ISSUE.TITLE: Is there any release scheduled supporting Azure (az) ?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: _From @lipp on August 9, 2017 9:43_ _Copied from original issue: zeit/now#46_

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Remove Microsoft Azure deployment section from README.md (#1138) Apparently azure deployment was listed in the docs before it was actually supported by now-cli. I just went through and become confused by the same error message and found the issue: https://github.com/zeit/now-cli/issues/787 It seems it's easy to remove this section and add it back later when the feature is added
